analysis.description:
RBAC.roles (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol#253-256) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- checkRole (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol#267-273)
	- hasRole (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol#276-280)
	- addRole (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol#283-294)
	- removeRole (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol#298-300)

Luckyblock.play (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol#750-816) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-ERC20Interface(_luckyblockSpend.spendTokenAddresses[i]).transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),_luckyblockSpend.spendTokenCount[i]) (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol#787-792)
	-ERC20Interface(_luckyblockEarn.earnTokenAddresses[k]).transfer(msg.sender,_luckyblockEarn.earnTokenCount[k]) (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol)

Luckyblock.withdrawToken (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-erc20.transfer(to,erc20.balanceOf(address(this))) (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol)
	-erc20.transfer(to,balance) (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol)

Luckyblock.play has external calls inside a loop:
	- ERC20Interface(_luckyblockEarn.earnTokenAddresses[k]).transfer(msg.sender,_luckyblockEarn.earnTokenCount[k]) (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol)

Luckyblock.play has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_luckyblockEarn.earnTokenAddresses[j]).balanceOf(address(this)) >= earnTokenCount) (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol#798-804)

Luckyblock.play has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_luckyblockSpend.spendTokenAddresses[i]).balanceOf(address(msg.sender)) >= _luckyblockSpend.spendTokenCount[i]) (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol#774-779)

Luckyblock.play has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(ERC20Interface(_luckyblockSpend.spendTokenAddresses[i]).allowance(address(msg.sender),address(this)) >= _luckyblockSpend.spendTokenCount[i]) (/unique_chucks/11/0x448e0209610a9064c776ae0255ad71ef49d58d0a.sol#779-785)

Luckyblock.play has external calls inside a loop:
